name: Alberto Masiero
subtitle: Group CFO presso VRV/Chart Industries
about: In 18 years as executive, I have managed Accounting, Finance and Cost Accounting areas.I have 15 years’ experience in US multinational companies, driving the integration of recently acquired Italian companies into international groups, implementing FP&A processes, taking the lead of change management and turnaround.In several occasions I have carried out extraordinary operations, acquisitions and Corporate special projects focused on maximizing group synergies.In the last years, I have also acquired strong competence in restructuring and I have managed serious issues in companies in financial distress.CORE RESPONSIBILITIES 	Financial Planning & Analysis and 	Financial management	Cash flow - NWC management - Net Financial Position	KPIs setting & management	Monthly fast closing	Investment initiatives	Annual and consolidated financial statements	US GAAP - IFRS - Italian GAAP (OIC)	Strategic analysis	Cost accounting	Credit management	SOX & Dlgs 231/2001	Turnaround & restructuring	Change management	Legal aspects and company governance	Liaising with B.o.D. - Shareholders - Statutory Auditors - Private Equity - Auditors - Banks
